channel.title: Enter not working in chat
channel.description:
What happened - Sometimes when you're typing and you press enter it doesn't enter your text into chat. So you have to press enter twice.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Pressing enter in chat is supposed to submit your text into chat.
#### Steps to reproduce:
It's random.
#### Comments:

item.title: Enter not working in chat
item.dc:creator: chutt
item.description:
What happened -
Sometimes when you’re typing and you press enter it doesn’t enter your text into chat. So you have to press enter twice.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Pressing enter in chat is supposed to submit your text into chat.

Steps to reproduce:

It’s random.
